title: Talking about Trouble - "this torture" refers to

content.question: In Paragraph 5, "this torture" refers to the

choices.label: inability to care properly for a loved one
failure to recognize another person's pain
inability to express our true feelings
sense that we have been a burden to others

content.answer: sense that we have been a burden to others

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
